mapper.select: select count(h.syslogno) as count_id from TRXLOGH h left join CIF c on c.device_code = h.device_code and h.device_code != '' left join LOOKUP_DATA ld on ld.lookup_value=h.trx_code and ld.lookup_cat=13 left join GROUP_LIMIT_HEADER g on g.id=c.cif_group inner join (select td.syslogno as syslogno, max(td.msglogno) as msglogno, td.bti_ref_no as hostRef from trxlogd td group by td.syslogno, td.bti_ref_no) td on td.syslogno = h.syslogno

select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${sortVariable} ${sortOrder}) AS ROWNUM, h.syslogno as sysLogNo, h.received_time as receivedTime, trxCode.lookup_desc as trxCode, h.srac as sourceAccount, h.dsac as destAccount, h.device_code as deviceCode, h.last_state as lastState, h.last_rc as lastRc, h.trx_value as amount, h.channel_type as channelType, td.msglogno as msgLogNo, td.hostRef as hostRef from TRXLOGH h left join CIF c on c.device_code = h.device_code and h.device_code != '' left join LOOKUP_DATA trxCode on trxCode.lookup_value = h.trx_code and trxCode.lookup_cat=13 left join GROUP_LIMIT_HEADER g on g.id = c.cif_group inner join (select td.syslogno as syslogno, max(td.msglogno) as msglogno, td.bti_ref_no as hostRef from trxlogd td group by td.syslogno, td.bti_ref_no) td on td.syslogno = h.syslogno
) AS ROWPAGING WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}

select h.syslogno as sysLogNo, h.received_time as receivedTime, trxCode.lookup_desc as trxCode, h.srac as sourceAccount, h.dsac as destAccount, h.last_state as lastState, h.last_rc as lastRc, h.trx_value as amount, h.channel_type as channelType from trxlogh h left join cif c on c.device_code = h.device_code and h.device_code != '' left join lookup_data trxCode on trxCode.lookup_value = h.trx_code and trxCode.lookup_cat=13 left join group_limit g on g.id = c.cif_group
